amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to create a time period for their credit report to change after making the consecutive payments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to create a time period for their credit report to change after making the consecutive payments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Cohen.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
